title: The Shining
author: Donna Connelly
body: My favorite film of Kubrick's. You feel like you're becoming as mad as Johnny while watching, building up cabin fever and fear in a mixture of nauseous scenes.

annotated_sentences.text: You feel like you're becoming as mad as Johnny while watching, building up cabin fever and fear in a mixture of nauseous scenes.

movie.justification: you feel like you are becoming as mad as johnny
